org.jboss.modules

Class ModuleLoadException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • org.jboss.modules.ModuleLoadException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ModuleNotFoundException

    public class ModuleLoadException
extends Exception
    Module load exception, thrown when there is some problem loading a module.
    Author:
    David M. Lloyd
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ModuleLoadException()
      Constructs a ModuleLoadException with no detail message.
      ModuleLoadException(String msg)
      Constructs a ModuleLoadException with the specified detail message.
      ModuleLoadException(String msg, Throwable cause)
      Constructs a ModuleLoadException with the specified detail message and cause.
      ModuleLoadException(Throwable cause)
      Constructs a ModuleLoadException with the specified cause.

      Convert to an unchecked error type.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ModuleLoadException

        public ModuleLoadException()
        Constructs a ModuleLoadException with no detail message. The cause is not initialized, and may subsequently be initialized by a call to initCause.

      • ModuleLoadException

        public ModuleLoadException(String msg)
        Constructs a ModuleLoadException with the specified detail message. The cause is not initialized, and may subsequently be initialized by a call to initCause.
        Parameters:
        msg - the detail message

      • ModuleLoadException

        public ModuleLoadException(Throwable cause)
        Constructs a ModuleLoadException with the specified cause. The detail message is set to: 
        (cause == null ? null : cause.toString())
        (which typically contains the class and detail message of cause).
        Parameters:
        cause - the cause (which is saved for later retrieval by the Throwable.getCause() method)

      • ModuleLoadException

        public ModuleLoadException(String msg,
                   Throwable cause)
        Constructs a ModuleLoadException with the specified detail message and cause.
        Parameters:
        msg - the detail message
        cause - the cause (which is saved for later retrieval by the Throwable.getCause() method)

    • Method Detail

      • toError

        public ModuleLoadError toError()
        Convert to an unchecked error type.
        Returns:
        the unchecked error
